segments.text: Look , the printer isn ’ t functioning well . I ’ Ve pushed the start button . It is suppose to be working now but it remains like a log . What ’ s going on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check . It has a paper jam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn ’ t pay attention to that . I will try to get the paper out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be careful , the cartridge can be very hot .
segments.speaker: S2
